contentrichtext.text: <!-- See [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Indian cities]] for details -->{{Infobox settlement | name = Quthbullapur | native_name = | native_name_lang = | other_name = | nickname = | settlement_type = city | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | pushpin_map = India Andhra Pradesh | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Andhra Pradesh, India | latd = 17.499313 | latm = | lats = | latNS = N | longd = 78.458261 | longm = | longs = | longEW = E | coordinates_display = inline,title | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{flag|India}} | subdivision_type1 = [[States and territories of India|State]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Andhra Pradesh]] | subdivision_type2 = [[List of districts of India|District]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Ranga Reddy district|Ranga Reddy]] | established_title = <!-- Established --> | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | government_type = | governing_body = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_rank = | area_total_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_total = 225816 | population_as_of = 2001 | population_rank = | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_footnotes = | demographics_type1 = Languages | demographics1_title1 = Official | demographics1_info1 = [[Telugu language|Telugu]] | timezone1 = [[Indian Standard Time|IST]] | utc_offset1 = +5:30 | postal_code_type = <!-- [[Postal Index Number|PIN]] --> | postal_code = | registration_plate = | website = | footnotes = }} '''Quthbullapur''' is a town and a [[municipality]] in [[Ranga Reddy district]] in the [[Andhra Pradesh]] [[States and territories of India|state]] of southern [[India]]. ==Demographics== {{As of|2001}} India [[census]],<ref>{{GR|India}}</ref> Quthbullapur had a population of 225,816. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Quthbullapur has an average literacy rate of 67%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 73%, and female literacy is 60%. In Quthbullapur, 14% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==Panchayats== There are 11 [[panchayat]]s in Quthbullapur mandal.<ref>[http://panchayat.gov.in/adminreps/viewpansumR.asp?selstate=0215007000&ptype=V&button1=Submit Details of Andhra Pradesh till Village Panchayat Tier]</ref> *[[Bachupally]] (village and panchayat) *[[Bahadurpally]] (village and panchayat) *[[Bowrampet]] (village and panchayat) *[[Dommara Pochampally]] (village and panchayat) *[[Doolapally]] (village and panchayat) *[[Dundigal]] (village and panchayat) *[[Gagilapur]] (village and panchayat) *[[Kompally]] (village and panchayat) *[[Pet Basheerbagh]] (village and panchayat) *[[Mallampet]] (village and panchayat) *[[Nizampet]] (village and panchayat) *[[Pragathinagar]] (village and panchayat) ==Election Information== Quthbullapur Constituency is New Constituency. It is formed after Delimitation. 2009 Election is first election in this constituency. Assembly Election Results in 2009 - KUNA SRISAILAM GOUD Won with 34.12 votes % ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Andhra Pradesh}} {{Cities and towns in Ranga Reddy district}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Ranga Reddy district]] [[Category:Mandals in Ranga Reddy district]] {{Rangareddi-geo-stub}}
